title: As low as $3,291* - plank flooring, VAULTED CEILINGS, w/d in unit!
neighborhood: 6300 Green Valley Circle, Culver City, CA
posting_body: Welcome to The Meadows Apartment Homes, a garden-style gated community conveniently located in the West Los Angeles neighborhood of Culver City, California.

Each of the newly renovated luxury one-bedroom apartments at The Meadows features a spacious open floor plan that includes plank flooring, a modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, central heat/AC, and in-home washers and dryers.
The apartments for rent at The Meadows are surrounded by lush greenery, mature vegetation, gorgeous courtyards, winding pathways, and babbling brooks.
When you step inside The Meadows Apartment Homes, its serene and peaceful atmosphere will transport you to a world far away from the hustle and bustle of Culver City.

At The Meadows Apartment Homes, you can stroll through our courtyards, lay out on the grass and soak up the sun, or enjoy the many other community amenities that make The Meadows one of the most desirable places to live in West LA.

Our convenient location puts you within walking distance of the famous trendy Westfield Culver City Mall, a wide range of dining and shopping options, public transportation, and quick access to the 405 and 90 freeways.
Modern luxury, lush surroundings and convenient premium location-The Meadows Apartment Homes offers the best of both worlds.
Take a tour of our newly renovated luxury one-bedroom apartment homes today!
- Two indoor spas featuring saunas and jacuzzi
- Two-story clubhouse with complimentary coffee, tea and WiFi
- Reservable conference room with seating for 10
- Rentable private event space on weekends
- Walking Distance to Westfield Mall and Fox Hills Park
- Assigned parking with covered parking available
- Fully gated community with 24-hour courtesy patrol
- Dog and cat friendly (breed restrictions apply)
- Flexible 3- to 12-month lease terms (additional fees may apply)
- High speed internet and DirecTV tech package
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
